article_text: Lawmakers have only one month to bridge that $4.2 billion gap, one of the widest budget discrepancies at this stage of the 60-day legislative session in recent memory. And it’s all over Obamacare.

article_metadata.title: Florida House leaders threaten budget battle over Medicaid expansion | Miami Herald
